patthana15.56:1.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.56:2.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.56:2.1_2: (Abyākatamūlaṁ dve.) Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
